name: Backend Climber
description: You are the code passionate. You discover new territories, climbing individually or with your team. You packed your bag of the best dev tools to be a strong backend for your users, as well as for your team. Your way is a various combination of precision,  inventiveness, challenge, cooperation and open-minded approach.
